title: Spider-Girl, Vol. 4: Turning Point
description: The adventures of Spider-Man's daughter continue as Mayday once again faces Kaine, Spider-Man swings again, and Darkdevil is... actually nice? Plus: Meet new heroes and villains, take a peek into the fantasies of Mayday's friends, and witness the return of the Green Goblin Collects Spider-Girl #17-21, 1/2.
author: Tom DeFalco
